Function to get a forest inventory from TROLL outputs.

Source: R/get_forest.trollsim.R
get_forest.Rd

Function to get a forest inventory from TROLL outputs.

get_forest(sim, ...)

# S4 method for trollsim
get_forest(sim, ...)

Arguments

sim

trollsim.

...

unused argument.

Value

data.frame

Examples


data("TROLLv3_output")
head(get_forest(TROLLv3_output))
